item.title: Blockchain Network Analysis
item.description: “Hmm, are decentralized banks really decentralized?” [GitHub Repo] [DOI: 10.1007/978-3-031-37717-4_67] Blockchain Network Analysis: A Comparative Study of Decentralized Banks Paper presented at SAI Computing Conference 2023 Authors: Yufan Zhang, Zichao Chen, Yutong Sun, Yulin Liu*, andÂ Luyao Zhang* Introduction Decentralized finance (DeFi) is known for its unique mechanism design, which applies smart contracts to facilitate peer-to-peer transactions. The decentralized bank is a typical DeFi application. Ideally, a decentralized bank should be decentralized in the transaction.
